entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: data on the use of the telephone, the way of getting a telephone, fees, opinion on services; family contacts in Transylvania, opinion about escape and its reasons; opinion about work, employer, unemployment and its problems

person
survey data

Three 1000-person national representative sample. The individual and postal blocks were asked from everyone, the ISSP questionnaire and the Transylvania questionnaire were asked from 1000 persons each.
face-to-face interview
A
